title: How do I post an image on the league forums
body:
I dont see a paperclip

http://prntscr.com/cjo3na

replies.body:
you paste the image url.
not the webpage, the actual image link, usually ending in one of the following:

.jpg
.png
.bmp
.gif

you can usually find it by right clicking on it and selecting "copy image location"  or   "copy image address" depending on your browser

*Wolfess* hit the nail right on the head! The info they provided is 100% accurate. We don't have a way to attach an image directly to a post or reply, so pasting a URL ending in one of the extensions that they mentioned is how you display a thumbnail for an image on your post.

Let me know if you have any questions.
